Class SimpleFastUserIndex<U>

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.fast.index.SimpleFastUserIndex<U>
  • Type Parameters:
    U - type of the users
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    UserIndex<U>, FastUserIndex<U>

    public class SimpleFastUserIndex<U>
extends Object
implements FastUserIndex<U>
    Simple implementation of FastUserIndex backed by a bi-map IdxIndex
